title: Activities
text:
We meet weekly to discuss papers in the areas of programming languages and software verification, and to discuss the group itself. The goal is to encourage interactions and discussions between students, researchers, and faculty with interests in these areas. Our meetings are open to everybody interested in these topics.




We meet on [DAY], [TIME] at [PLACE].

title: Programming Languages & Formal Methods
text:
We are a [WHAT] group on [TOPIC] at DCC-FCUP. Our aim is to [GOALS]. Our research interests include:

Software verification and theorem proving
Program testing and analysis
Programming languages and type systems
Program logics and semantics
Automata Theory and Descriptional Complexity

We aim to provide an active and inclusive research environment that includes [ACTIVITIES]. If you are interested in learning more, come to one of our meetings, or get in touch.
